title: Never Fail: Success Strategies
description: In a difficult economic environment, the troubled, hurting, and perplexed are looking for hope. When life becomes overwhelming, take courage because there is a way to relief. This nonfiction work attempts to fill that void and provide answers. The strategies spelled out here can help bring peace in spite of the storm and bring direction as to which way to head. This book may not be a cure-all for every ill, but it definitely speaks to the places where people live. Whether you are a counselor, psychiatrist, psychologist, patient, or someone battling some form of addictive behavior, you will benefit from this book.**Note: This book is no longer in print.
author: Craig W. Dressler
